root.name: Galactic Warriors
root.description: Galactic Warriors is a fighting arcade game released by Konami in 1985. The game is notable for being the first fighting game to have multiple characters for the player to choose from, a draining health bar (as opposed to more traditional blocks of health), projectiles, the ability to attack more than once in mid-air, and attacks of varying strength. The player can choose from three characters: Poseidon, a large robot with an extending limb; Samson, a robot wielding a sword; and Gaea, a female robot whose breasts are projectiles. Galactic Warriors was released in Microsoft's Game Room on September 22, 2010.
